segments.text: And there's a little upside-down Dilbert on the underside .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When you flip the tie up , he's right side up . Brilliant .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My dad will love this . He's a Dilbert fan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wouldn't mind having one myself ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow ! You look just as dorky as Dilbert !
segments.speaker: S1
